descriptionHTML:
The first file manager for the Android Wear operation system. Easily browse through the entire Android Wear file system. Open and view file content quickly by touching on the corresponding file icon. More features will be available soon. Download this helper now for free.


Get more top apps, games & news with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-To open: Go to "Start..." and open the app "File Manager" or say "Start File Manager"

Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let me know.
comments: Sdcard inaccessible How to avoid this problem? How can we transfer files directly into the watch?
Doesn't work Looking for a way to delete old music from my watch. This app doesn't actually do anything, and cannot even view the contents of the internal storage.
Lame :/ Let's you view files ON your watch but has no way to remove downloaded music, or other files and no phone companion.
Meh Way WAY too much white space between lines, no display of file/folder sizes, no way to delete any files at all. Nice proof of concept but let's make it useful.
Needs WORK... File VIEWER would be a Better Title.  No editing or even a Property Card with size, location,  & other file/directory information. MANAGER it's not ðŸ˜¨
Useless. You can't access any folder of any importance. And you can't view it on your phone.
